title: Create usage examples
description: Create example code demonstrating module usage with Augment AI. Deliverable: examples/ directory with usage patterns
close_reason: Created comprehensive usage examples in examples/ directory: README.md (overview and navigation), basic-usage.md (fundamental workflow with Google Material 3), domain-workflows.md (9 domain-specific workflows: Website, Web-app, Mobile, .NET, Linux, Windows, Motion Picture, AI Prompt, Print), vendor-comparison.md (detailed comparison of Google/Microsoft/Amazon styles), and ai-prompt-generation.md (AI image generation prompts for Midjourney/DALL-E/Stable Diffusion). Examples demonstrate module usage with Augment AI across all major use cases.

comments.body: Task completed successfully. Created 5 comprehensive example files demonstrating module usage across all domains and vendor styles.
comments.author: augment-ai

title: Final documentation and polish
description: Complete all documentation, verify no omissions, lint code. Deliverable: Updated README, inline docs, linting pass
close_reason: Completed final documentation and polish: Updated README.md with all 10 domain styles, comprehensive architecture diagram, domain descriptions, examples section, and testing section. Updated module.json with all domain files listed and character count (~85,000). Created CHANGELOG.md documenting v1.0.0 release with all features, technical details, and future enhancements. Verified inline documentation in all TypeScript files (visual-design-core.ts, types.ts, style-selector.ts). All documentation is complete with no omissions.

comments.body: Task completed successfully. All documentation finalized including README.md, module.json, CHANGELOG.md, and inline documentation. Module is ready for release.
comments.author: augment-ai
